name: web-page-design-mode
title: Web Page Design Mode
description: Toggle the document.designMode property on your web page to control whether the entire document is editable.
author: danulqua

commands.name: toggle-design-mode
commands.title: Toggle Design Mode
commands.description: Toggles the document.designMode property on your web page to control whether the entire document is editable.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
